lines: 1. Telna O yaye Ruoth Jehova,Kuom wuodha e piny marach;An anyap to in gi tekoJuka gi lueti matekKuon mar poloKuon mar polo,Pidha nyaka yieng` chutho(yieng` chutho).
2. Yaw koro soko mar lerniKama pi ngima wuokie;Ket bor Polo maber mogwedhiTelna e wuodha duto;Ruoth molochoRuoth molocho,Bed teko g`okumba (gokumba).
3. Ka wuotho e geng aoch JordanMi mondo luocha olal;Ruodh ruodhi makelo ngimaKel ngima loka Kanaan;Wende ma pakiWende ma paki,Ana wer nigi pile (wer pile).
